resources.string: DRIMTIM crew kindly present to your attention Android version of the old puzzle game «Lights Out».\n \nThanks a lot Avi Olti, Gyora Benedek, Zvi Herman, Revital Bloomberg, Avi Weiner and Michael Ganor for idea and our moms for love. We remember and respect your work!

Today, your task is as follows - turn off the lights in the apartments of five-story building.
 
It is not a simple task: when you touch the switch in one of the apartments, the neighbors hear it and also change the position of the switch to confuse you (If it is on, it turns off, and vise versa).
 
Outwit these good and smart people and show what can happen when the light dims.
